main event: Mr. and Mrs. Frank A. Landis from Burbank, California, observed a large, round, white object hovering and moving back and forth on November 3, 1957.
interesting points: The object was described as luminous., The object hovered before moving to a rapid speed and disappearing., There were 2 confirmed witnesses to the sighting., The observation was reported in connection with Project Blue Book., The sighting report was completed and sent to the Aerial Phenomena Section Office.
witness description: Mr. and Mrs. Frank A. Landis
